recordTypes.name: Building Permit Application: Commerical
recordTypes.description:
Commercial applications include residential cluster development over two homes, three-family homes or above, townhouses, and condos. 

All work associated with commercial use, including roofing, windows, siding, and pools must use this application.

recordTypes.name: Building Permit Application: One or Two Family
recordTypes.description:
This application is used for, New Construction, Additions, Alterations, Repairs, and Demolition of One or Two-family homes only. 

Commercial applications are used for residential cluster development over two homes, three-family homes or above, townhouses, and condos.

recordTypes.name: Building Permit Application: Residential Roofing - Windows - Siding
Building Permit Application: One or Two Family: Pool
Building Department: Business Certificate Qualification Form
recordTypes.description: This request is for businesses / companies leasing or renting commercial space.

recordTypes.name: Home Occupation Application
recordTypes.description: Home occupation: An owner occupied business use conducted within a dwelling that is incidental and secondary to the primary residential use, carried on by the inhabitants of the dwelling, and does not alter the residential character of the property.

recordTypes.name: FALA Annual Certificate
recordTypes.description: Family accessory living areas are required to be inspected yearly. Failure to comply with zoning requirements could result in the removal of the unit.
